JOB DESCRIPTION: Deliver IT solutions that ensure smooth and continuous operations of NovelVox s business activities.   Provide proposed solutions hands-on technical leadership around Java and associated products, J2EE, XML, RMI, JMS, JBOSS, Eclipse and JSP.   Participate in full life-cycle software development.   Knowledge of advanced Java topics such as multithreading, garbage collection internals, memory debugging and portability of Java applications.   Participate in a multi-discipline team that supports the life-cycle activities of software products and systems.   Code, test and deploy solutions using multiple technologies.   Write clean, tested, and well-documented code.   Maintaining systems by monitoring and correcting software defects     Skills     Candidate should have good communication skills.   Strong analytical & problem-solving skills.   Lead and mentor new team members to bring them up to speed.   Should have extensive experience on Apache Server.   3+ years of experience in Java J2ee.
